A geospatial position expressed in [EPSG:4326](https://epsg.io/4326) latitude and longitude (North/East-positive degrees).

## Rerun datatype
[`DVec2D`](../datatypes/dvec2d.md)


## Arrow datatype
```
FixedSizeList<2, float64>
```
